EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to the customer when the offer letter is due to expire in 5 days
EmailTemplate.name: Offer letter due to expire in 5 days
EmailTemplate.subject: Al Rayan Bank property finance application update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Salutation} {!Account.FirstName} {!Account.LastName},
Please find below an update on the progress of your application for property finance from Al Rayan Bank.
We recently sent you a letter advising that as yet we have not received back your signed copy of our offer.
Please note that Al Rayan Bank PLC offers are subject to acceptance within thirty days of the date of the offer letter. After this time, if we have not received a signed copy of the offer letter, we reserve the right to withdraw it.
Your offer is due to expire in 5 days, after which time we will withdraw the offer we have made, and we will need to provide you with a new offer before you can proceed.
If you have already responded to the letter we sent you, please disregard this email. If you respond to this email and subsequently receive our letter, please ignore the letter.
If you have any questions about this email or your offer letter, please do not hesitate to contact our Sales Support team on 0121 456 7878 or email salessupport@alrayanbank.co.uk, between 9.00am and 5.30pm, Monday to Friday.
Kind regards
Al Rayan Bank
